scripts.build:win64: npm run prebuild:pkg && pkg package.json --targets node18-win-x64 --output talktome_win64 --assets public/**/* --assets node_modules/socket.io/client-dist/**/* --assets node_modules/mediasoup/worker/out/Release/* --assets node_modules/better-sqlite3/build/Release/better_sqlite3.node && npm run postbuild:pkg
scripts.build:mac_arm64: npm run prebuild:pkg && pkg package.json --targets node18-macos-arm64 --output talktome_arm64 --assets "public/**/*" --assets "node_modules/socket.io/client-dist/**/*" --assets "node_modules/mediasoup/worker/out/Release/mediasoup-worker*" --assets "node_modules/better-sqlite3/build/Release/better_sqlite3.node" && cp node_modules/better-sqlite3/build/Release/better_sqlite3.node ./better_sqlite3.node && cp node_modules/mediasoup/worker/out/Release/mediasoup-worker* ./ && npm run postbuild:pkg
